ConfirmNumberOfWins.say: {numberOfWins} is a big number, are you sure you want to play until one of us wins {numberOfWins} times?

AskUserChoice.say: I made my choice already, what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?

TiedResult.say: Oh! we tied on this one. Great minds think alike, they say. I'll beat you in the next round.

UserWins.say: Oh, you won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

AlexaWins.say: I won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

Help.say: This is the classic rock paper scissors. You can start a new game by saying start a game. You can check the score by saying score. You can leave the game by saying stop.
